name: Descent (Lily Harrison)
description:
A work in progress project, a short walk through of an individuals home. You can sense something is off about this place but are eager to find out more, who is this person? What's going on here?

How to play:

- Explore the home by interacting with objects

Controls:

Look - Mouse

Walk - Arrow keys

What I'm hoping to add shortly:

- More trigger events

- Intractability with objects  i.e pick up and zoom in 

Please feel free to leave (constructive) feedback as this is a incomplete project that I'm constantly trying to improve! :)
